item.title: Now Reading: 14 February, 2021
item.description: Books Non-fiction Honestly, I don’t have the appetite for non-fiction at this time of the quarter. But if I do come across one, it’ll make its way here.

item.title: Now Reading: 15 November, 2020
item.description: Books Non-fiction Race After Technology, by Ruha Benjamin Part of the week’s readings in the ‘Technologies of Race-Making’ seminar.

item.title: Now Reading: 8 November, 2020
item.description: Insert Lead paragraph here. Books Non-fiction Algorithms of Oppression, by Safiya Noble Discussing this book in class sent me on a tizzy.

item.title: Demographic Bias in Model Design and Big Tech
item.description: In today’s weekly CSS Workshop, we had a duo from AirBnB presenting work on ‘Designing for Trust’ in the context of the sharing economy.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Testing what this looks like. Ideally, I’d be able to do a whole new layout for the about page. Let’s see.
About: Adarsh Mathew Hi! I’m currently a graduate student in the Masters in Computational Social Science program at the University of Chicago.
